call_uber.title: Uber Says No
text: You call an Uber. The app says 3 minutes away.
When the driver pulls up and sees your condition—sweaty, stained, and barely upright—he locks the doors and rolls down the window two inches.
'Sorry, I’d have to burn my car,' he says, before speeding off.
You sit back down on the curb, humiliated and a little amused. Even capitalism has limits, apparently.

choices.text: 📸 Film a TikTok: 'Uber refused me but my cat wouldn’t'
